Do you know why?

All we need is the LANGUAGE.POD for english. i found the german (not russian) one. if you really wanted you could go through and change all the items one by one but if you could just get the .pod file in english and replace it that should work

@boo991
Thanks for the shout out. I'm looking into the esc issue btw.

To change the language to english follow this steps:

- Go to Applications Folder
- Right-click on TWD Survival Instinct and select Show Package Contents
- Go to drive_c > Program Files > The Walking Dead Survival Instinct
- Open the file "steam_rld.ini"
- At the end of the file change the "Language=russian" to "Language=english"

Voilà :D
